author: J. Edward Moreno
title: California Gov. Newsom: Major banks agree to 90-day mortgage grace period
description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom (D) announced Wednesday that major banks have agreed to give a 90-day grace period for mortgage payments in the state.During a Wednesday briefing, Newsom said more than 200 banks, inclu...
